posts.title: Title
posts.text: Hello and welcome to my blog!

pages.title: About me & this blog
pages.text: Arita Zhang/Shuang Zhang. Arita是从17年沿用迄今的英文笔名，而Shuang Zhang/张爽是本名。 22基础医学直博生/base杭州紫金港/单细胞方向的生信er。 A PhD(actually MD) student in Zhejiang University, PRC. My research interests are the bioinformatical analyses for single-cell omics(scRNA-seq & scATAC-seq. ST is still in learning.) 不仅是科研方向的blog！所以记录什么都有w This blog not only contains some research posts, but will include some day-logs for the life routine and some…well, hobbies to refresh? 生活关键字：QQ飞车手游 Keyword for the retreat: QQSpeed Mobile.
